summary: This is an email from June 24, 2020, discussing a perjury charge related to an individual who allegedly lied during a 2016 civil deposition about their involvement with Jeffrey Epstein. The email includes a question about the basis for the perjury charge.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the person with whom an unnamed individual was involved, leading to a deposition and perjury charge.

events.title: Civil deposition about Epstein involvement
events.description: An individual gave a deposition in a civil case where she was asked specific questions about her involvement with Jeffrey Epstein and allegedly lied.

events.title: Email discussion of perjury charge
events.description: An email exchange discusses a perjury charge related to false statements made during the 2016 deposition about Epstein involvement.

keyFacts: An individual allegedly lied during a 2016 civil deposition when asked about her involvement with Jeffrey Epstein.
A perjury charge was being considered or discussed as of June 2020 related to those false statements.
The email seeks clarification on the basis for the perjury charge.
The document indicates ongoing legal scrutiny of false testimony related to Epstein's activities.
